LanguageData.AllowCorpsesColonist.label: Tillåt kolonisters kroppar
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.label: Tillåt främlingars kroppar
LanguageData.AllowCorpsesStranger.description: Tillåt döda före detta främlingar och fiender.
LanguageData.AllowRotten.label: allow rotten
LanguageData.AllowRotten.description: Allow organic things which have started to rot.
LanguageData.AllowNonSmeltableWeapons.label: allow non-smeltable
LanguageData.AllowNonSmeltableWeapons.description: Allow weapons which can't be smelted.
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.label: allow plant food
LanguageData.AllowPlantFood.description: Allow foods that are of quality equivalent to unharvested plants, like hay.
